metadata.title: CVE-2019-13615 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
libebml before 1.3.6, as used in the MKV module in VideoLAN VLC MediaPlayer binaries before 3.0.3, has a heap-based buffer over-read inEbmlElement::FindNextElement.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13615` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libebml4v5 - 1.3.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libebml package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-1ubuntu0.1').
